introBlock.title: Hello World!
introBlock.intro:
I am Lenin Hasda, a life long learner, passionate programmer, hobbyist drawer sketch artist, hacker (sometimes) and a maker.

Currentry I am:
  • working as a Ghopher at Pathao
  • building microservices at scale
  • playing with docker and kubernetes
  • trying to learn guitar
